body: Georges Bourdoukan finds similarities between the revolution in Egypt and the end of the Military Dictatorship in Brazil (in 1964). For him, the Egyptians must overcome the system and not to put in power someone like Brazil did, someone not entirely compromized with national interests.
original_body: Georges Bourdoukan finds similarities between the revolution in Egypt and the end of the Military Dictatorship in Brazil (in 1964). For him, the Egyptians must overcome the system and not to put in power someone like Brazil did, someone not entirely compromized with national interests.
title: Brazil, Egypt - Similarities between the revolution and the Brazilian Military Dictatorship
